mapper.select: SELECT a.divisionId, a.divisionName, a.customer, (SELECT customer.`name` FROM customer WHERE customer.id = a.customer) customerName, a.expenseTotal, SUM(a.expenseTotal) sumExpenseTotal, (SUM(a.expenseOther) + SUM(a.expensePass) )sumExpenseOther FROM orderService a WHERE a.idOrderServiceRecord = #{id} AND a.statusOrder = 'ap2' GROUP BY a.customer,a.divisionId

SELECT (SELECT (SELECT permission.`name` FROM permission WHERE permission.`parentCode` = '7102000' AND permission.`code` = rp.code) FROM rolepermission rp WHERE rp.parentCode = '7102000' AND rp.typeId = a.divisionId LIMIT 1) nameGroup,
(SELECT `user`.displayName FROM `user` WHERE `user`.id = a.driverId) AS nameDriver, a.divisionName, SUM(a.expenseTotal) sumExpenseTotal, (SUM(a.expenseOther) + SUM(a.expensePass) ) sumExpenseOther, (SELECT division.`name` FROM division WHERE division.id = a.customer) customerName, a.customer, (SELECT userinfor.`name` FROM userinfor WHERE userinfor.`code` = a.typeExpense ) AS nameTypeExpense, a.* FROM orderservice a WHERE a.statusOrder IN ('ap3', 'rd') GROUP BY driverId, divisionName ORDER BY driverId, divisionName
